p: Thanks for your good letters. That is nice about the ring - but I don't feel we should accept it for only $150. We planned to pay you more on it when we could.
I'll be very busy between now and Saturday - I only hope I can get every thing done! I shall probably leave here late Saturday night.
We thanked garden at Enid's and Ollie's yesterday!
ruth Hornby's mother gave me a surprise shower Sat. afternoon. I got so many lovely things!
It is here - How I hope the 18th will be fair and warm!
